ygData.subject: Re: Corpse Recoveries
ygData.msgSnippet: You might have also pointed out to him that he could have pettitioned a gm for it.  Of course, on erollisi marr we have very few gm s and I ve actually gone
ygData.messageBody:
You might have also pointed out to him that he could
have pettitioned a gm for it. Of course, on erollisi
marr we have very few gm's and I've actually gone the
lenght of OOT with people when no gm's were there to
help. Kinda nice, every now and then when I auction
in Kelethin, some on will shout out "Llewrend, your
still my hero" or something like that. Some times a
bards just gotta sit at home and watch the kids.
